content.rendered:
Monday, October 28, 2024

Today is a “C” Day

Club Meetings and Information

  • A Hand Up Club is looking for members who will inspire others to make the world a better place. We are open to all grade levels. Come learn about lending a hand at our next meeting in room 278 (Red Springs) after school on Monday October 28th.
  • Introduction to Bagpiping Club will meet on Monday after school in P222. Don’t forget your chanter and music.
  • The No Place for Hate meeting is rescheduled and is now Monday after school in room 257. There will not be a meeting on Wednesday.
  • Science club will meet today in room 267. We will be doing a special Halloween themed experiment!
  • Best Buddies is BACK at Maple Ave! Our first meeting will be on October 30th 2:30-3:00 in the Large Group Room. Come and find out more about this awesome club! Contact Miss Douglas with any questions!

Check out the Maple Avenue Club Calendar for club meetings and room information!

As always, BE SAFE, BE RESPECTFUL, BE RESPONSIBLE, BE KIND!

Make it a great day, or not…the choice is yours.
